title: drafts being sent when switching to another app
creator: jeffrey.dubinsky+firefox
content:
I believe I found a bug. When drafting an email and switching away from Thunderbird the draft email gets sent but still remains in the drafts folder.

I created two emails today and had to switch away multiple times to get some information to paste into the emails. Thunderbird evidently sent out the draft in its current format whenever I switched away from the app.

title: ip address temporarily blacklisted for thunderbird android mobile by Avast mobile Web Guard
creator: thomas.peeples

title: synchronisation of Thunderbird Android incoming messages
creator: alseb75
content:
I am on Android 16 on a Samsung phone. My messaging server is a POP. I have enabled the synchronisation on the inbox. I have set the period of synchronisation to 15 min I have enabled the notifications on the inbox. I have enabled the notifications of new message on the account I have enabled the notification of Thunderbird on Android

but it is not working !
metadata: ;useragent:Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/143.0.0.0 Safari/537.36;os:Android 16;kb_visits_prior:["/en-US/kb/configure-push-email-thunderbird-android", "/en-US/kb/getting-started-thunderbird-android"];solver_id:7297850

title: [Imap account] Sent messages miss the Sent folder
creator: dxtr80
content: Recently, I saw that sent messages are not landing in the Sent folder and are just sent. So, no footprint in this case for sent messages. I checked this issue in the same TB for Android and 2nd account (different imap server) and no issue like this.
metadata: ;useragent:Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64; rv:146.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/146.0;os:TB Android 14.0, Motorola Razr 60 ultra, Android 15;solver_id:7297958

title: I changed my Thunderbird password last Friday and have not been able to see those emails on my S23.  WHY?
creator: email14
content: I called Samsung, Tmobile, Geek Squad and Costco where I purchased my S23. I cannot receive emails had been ever since I had a cell phone and nearly 3 years ago when I purchased my S23. I cannot log into Microsoft because my account is block. I want to keep my current email address with Ionos.com. Please help me. Jay
metadata: ;useragent:Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64; rv:146.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/146.0
